Mariah Carey engaged to billionaire James Packer

Singer Mariah Carey is reportedly engaged to her billionaire boyfriend James Packer, just eight months after they started dating. This will be a third marriage for both the R&B diva and the Australian businessman.

Packer proposed to Carey with a 35-carat diamond ring. No wedding date is set just yet, reports eonline.com.

“They fell head over heels in love with one another. It’s crazy how perfect they are together, they both know it,” a source said. — IANS
title: Mariah Carey reportedly engaged to James Packer
